newsitem.title: PERU: Peru government, rebels end third round of talks.
newsitem.headline: Peru government, rebels end third round of talks.

text.p: The Peruvian government and Marxist rebels on Saturday completed a third round of negotiations seeking a peaceful solution to the 60-day hostage crisis.

Government negotiator Domingo Palermo and Tupac Amaru Revolutionary Movement (MRTA) spokesman Rolly Rojas, alias "The Arab," met for around three hours in a safe house opposite the besieged Japanese ambassador's residence where 72 VIP hostages are being held. Their talks ended at around 2:30 P.M. local time (1930 GMT).
